languages.text: {n}Идира поднимает на вас взгляд покрасневших глаз. Несмотря на печать усталости на лице, она широко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли чему-то за вашей спиной.{/n} "Что же, Лорд-капитан... шепотки мои чуток притихли, словно знают, что веревочка, что все вилась, конец нашла. Сейчас или никогда, да? Как бы то ни было — спасибо вам за все, Лорд-капитан".

{n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉红着眼睛，抬头看着你。尽管她脸上带着疲惫的表情，但她还是笑得很开心，或许是对着你，又或许是对着你身后的什么东西。{/n}“你看，舰长大人……那些窃窃私语的声音终于安静下来了，就好像它们知道，我们一直以来的追查终于走到了尽头。机不可失，是吧？无论怎样，感谢你做的一切，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉红着眼睛，抬头看着你。尽管她脸上带着疲惫的表情，但她还是笑得很开心，或许是对着你，又或许是对着你身后的什么东西。{/n}“你看，舰长大人……那些窃窃私语的声音终于安静下来了，就好像它们知道，我们一直以来的追查终于走到了尽头。机不可失，是吧？无论怎样，感谢你做的一切，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira con los ojos enrojecidos. A pesar de su aspecto cansado, sonríe abiertamente, o a ti o a algo a tu espalda.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... mis susurros se han acallado, como si supieran que por fin estamos llegando al final del largo camino que hemos estado siguiendo desde el principio. Es ahora o nunca, ¿no? Sea lo que sea, gracias por todo, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."

A pesar de su aspecto cansado, sonríe abiertamente, o a ti o a algo a tu espalda.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... mis susurros se han acallado, como si supieran que por fin estamos llegando al final del largo camino que hemos estado siguiendo desde el principio. Es ahora o nunca, ¿no? Sea lo que sea, gracias por todo, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}イディラは目を赤くしてあなたを見上げている。疲れた表情だが、彼女はあなたに向かって、もしくはあなたの背後の何かに向かって満面の笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あの、ロード・キャプテン...私が聞こえるささやきは静かになったわ。まるで、私たちがたどってきた長い糸が終わりに到達したことを知っているみたいね。今しかないでしょう？いずれにせよ、ロード・キャプテン、今まで本当にありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは目を赤くしてあなたを見上げている。疲れた表情だが、彼女はあなたに向かって、もしくはあなたの背後の何かに向かって満面の笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「あの、ロード・キャプテン...私が聞こえるささやきは静かになったわ。まるで、私たちがたどってきた長い糸が終わりに到達したことを知っているみたいね。今しかないでしょう？いずれにせよ、ロード・キャプテン、今まで本当にありがとう」

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt mit geröteten Augen zu dir auf. Trotz ihres müden Gesichtsausdrucks grinst sie breit. Entweder dich an oder wegen irgendetwas hinter dir.{/n} "Nun, Lord Captain ... Meine kleinen Flüsterer sind verstummt. Es ist, als wüssten sie, dass der lange Faden, dem wir gefolgt sind, endlich sein Ende erreicht hat. Es heißt jetzt oder nie, oder nicht? Ich danke Euch jedenfalls für alles, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."

Es ist, als wüssten sie, dass der lange Faden, dem wir gefolgt sind, endlich sein Ende erreicht hat. Es heißt jetzt oder nie, oder nicht? Ich danke Euch jedenfalls für alles, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Idira lève vers vous ses yeux rougis. Malgré son évidente lassitude, elle affiche un large sourire, que ce soit à votre intention ou à la vue de quelque chose derrière vous.{/n} « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Mes petits murmures se sont tus, comme s'ils savaient qu'on arrive au bout du long fil qu'on suit depuis tout ce temps. C'est maintenant ou jamais, pas vrai ? Quoi qu'il arrive, merci pour tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with reddened eyes. Despite the tired look on her face, she smiles broadly, either at you or at something behind you.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My little whisperers have grown quiet, it's like they know the long thread we've been following is finally at an end. It's now or never, isn't it? Thank you for everything either way, Lord Captain."
